projects.name: Remindu
projects.intro: A Vue.js app to tackle food expiration problems
projects.contribution: Independently designed and built the app: frontend architecture, routing, styling, and database design.

projects.name: Python Plants vs. Zombies
projects.intro: Implemented parts of Plants vs. Zombies using Python and the CMU Graphics library
projects.contribution: Implemented several plant/zombie mechanics and changed the victory condition using CMU Graphics.

projects.name: Daily Guessing Challenge Refresher
projects.intro: Refreshes previous questions so the 'Guess Salt' daily challenge can vary randomly
projects.contribution: Extended the original plugin to include 'Guess Farmer' and 'Guess Porridge'.

projects.name: F18 Super Hornet Maker
projects.intro: Redesigns the F-18 cockpit console by moving from breadboards to PCB for stability, integration and visual coherence via engineering iterations.
projects.contribution: Designed the PCB and programmed the microcontroller.

projects.name: Building a Distributed Service with AWS and Python
projects.intro: Builds an elastic computing system with AWS & Python for scalable digit recognition, balancing load dynamically to avoid backlog and waste.
projects.contribution: Independently delivered frontend architecture, elasticity strategy, server setup and database design.

projects.name: Alibaba International Olympic Day - Robot Sports Meet
projects.intro: Built, programmed and tuned the PID parameters to keep the robot balance, enabling the robot to run on a 3.5-kilometer sports field.
projects.contribution: Built the robot and participated in PID parameter tuning and formula derivation.
